name: frenzy-plant
caption: Frenzy Plant

effect.short: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or [switch]{mechanic:switch} out during that turn.

flavorText:
